home.description: I'm a full stack developer with over 5 years of experience, passionate about technology and innovation.

about.description: I am a Fullstack Programmer Analyst with over 5 years of experience in the banking, web/mobile sector, and multinational companies specializing in back-office solutions. I excel in developing new features, API integration, and database management, ensuring efficient and scalable solutions.My expertise includes frontend development with Angular and React, and backend with .NET Framework, .NET Core, and ASP.NET MVC. I thrive in dynamic environments, applying agile methodologies like Scrum to ensure high-quality deliverables. Committed to continuous learning, I specialize in implementing modern technologies and optimizing code, ensuring the successful achievement of project goals.
